Visible Items:Symbols Visible Property

Short Name: SymsVis

Requires: Base Development System

Class: TreeControl Properties

To Use: Create a property.

If TRUE, displays the item symbols.

This property is similar to the Visible Items»Symbols item on the shortcut menu of a tree control and the Show symbols option on the Appearance page of the Properties dialog box.

Example

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Settable when the VI is runningYes
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes

Example

Refer to the Setting Custom Tree Item Symbols VI in the labview\examples\Controls and Indicators\Tree directory for an example of using the Visible Items:Symbols Visible property.
